CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 2, 1962, pg. 13, reads: "His Day - The City of Pittsburgh officially proclaimed last Saturday at 'Adam Wade Day.' Shown at ceremonies in Mayor's office are left to right: Mrs. Henry Wade Jr., Keith Wade, Henry Wade, the father of the honoree; J. Craig Kuhn, City Councilman, and acting Mayor of the city; Adam Wade, Mrs. A. Wade, Mrs. Earsley F. Kincaid, Mrs. Delgratia Allen, Mrs. Lillian Mauney, Henry Wade Sr. and Mrs. Alberta Mason. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Mrs. Henry Wade Jr., Keith Wade, Henry Wade, acting Mayor of Pittsburgh J. Craig Kuhn, Adam Wade, Mrs. A. Wade, Mrs. Earsley F. Kincaid, Delgratia Allen, Lillian Mauney, Henry Wade Sr., and Alberta Mason, posed in Office of Mayor for "Adam Wade Day"
